topic.title: Whitelist
topic.body:
I would like a whitelist option, so I could make a clearnet proxy for my websites. 

There is already a blacklist option, so I'm hoping a whitelist option should be fairly easy to add. 

So for instance i would clearnet my site, my forum, zerohello and zeroid, so people could interact with a subset of zeronet.

Thanks.

1604066005_mirrored_elspru_github.body: oh, I found --multiuser_no_new_sites  I think that is equivalent
